channel.title: Charlie Sheen on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Charlie Sheen’s Former Drug Dealer Ended Up in His New Netflix Doc: “When Do You Ever Hear From the Dealer?”
item.description: The actor premiered his two-part documentary ‘aka Charlie Sheen’ in L.A. on Thursday alongside Marco Abeta, the dealer that helped him get sober.

item.title: How Charlie Sheen’s Former Drug Dealer Ended Up in His New Netflix Doc: “When Do You Ever Hear From the Dealer?”
item.description: The actor premiered his two-part documentary ‘aka Charlie Sheen’ in L.A. on Thursday alongside Marco Abeta, the dealer that helped him get sober.

item.title: Charlie Sheen “Finally Ready to Confess” in Netflix’s Brutally Candid Documentary
item.description: Sheen and members of his inner circle give the inside story of the actor’s infamous “tiger blood” meltdown.
